verses.verse: These things<WG5023> have I spoken<WG2980> unto you,<WG5213> that<WG2443> ye should not<WG3361> be offended. <WG4624>

But <WG1161> now<WG3568> I go my way<WG5217> to<WG4314> him that sent<WG3992> me;<WG3165> and<WG2532> none<WG3762> of<WG1537> you<WG5216> asketh<WG2065> me,<WG3165> Whither<WG4226> goest<WG5217> thou?

<WG1161> Of <WG4012> righteousness,<WG1343> because<WG3754> I go<WG5217> to<WG4314> my<WG3450> Father,<WG3962> and<WG2532> ye see<WG2334> me<WG3165> no<WG3756> more; <WG2089>
<WG1161> Of <WG4012> judgment,<WG2920> because<WG3754> the<WG3588> prince<WG758> of this<WG5127> world<WG2889> is judged. <WG2919>
I have<WG2192> yet<WG2089> many things<WG4183> to say<WG3004> unto you,<WG5213> but<WG235> ye cannot <WG1410> <WG3756> bear <WG941> them now. <WG737>

He <WG1565> shall glorify<WG1392> me: <WG1691> for<WG3754> he shall receive<WG2983> of<WG1537> mine,<WG1699> and<WG2532> shall show<WG312> it unto you. <WG5213>

A woman<WG1135> when<WG3752> she is in travail<WG5088> hath<WG2192> sorrow,<WG3077> because<WG3754> her<WG846> hour<WG5610> is come: <WG2064> but<WG1161> as soon as<WG3752> she is delivered<WG1080> of the<WG3588> child,<WG3813> she remembereth<WG3421> no<WG3756> more<WG2089> the<WG3588> anguish,<WG2347> for<WG1223> joy<WG5479> that<WG3754> a man<WG444> is born<WG1080> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> world. <WG2889>
